select * from ( select d.yymmdd, d.product_no, d.reg_date, d.emp_no, d.emp_name, d.product_name, d.title, d.purPrice, d.purQuantity, d.salePrice, d.saleQuantity from ( SELECT a.product_no, a.yymmdd, a.reg_date, a.emp_no, a.emp_name, a.product_name, a.title, NVL(c.pur_Price, 0) AS purPrice, NVL(c.pur_Quantity, 0) AS purQuantity, NVL(c.sale_Price, 0) AS salePrice, NVL(c.sale_Quantity, 0) AS saleQuantity, rownum rm FROM ( SELECT spm.product_no, spm.yymmdd, spm.reg_date, spm.emp_no, e.emp_name, p.product_name, ca.title FROM spm_recodes spm LEFT JOIN product p ON p.product_no = spm.product_no LEFT JOIN categories ca ON p.mid_category = ca.mid_category LEFT JOIN emp e ON e.emp_no = spm.emp_no GROUP BY spm.yymmdd, spm.reg_date, spm.emp_no, e.emp_name, p.product_name, ca.title, spm.product_no ) a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT spm.yymmdd, spm.product_no, MAX(CASE WHEN spm.sale_or_purchase = 0 THEN spm.price ELSE 0 END) AS pur_Price, MAX(CASE WHEN spm.sale_or_purchase = 0 THEN spm.quantity ELSE 0 END) AS pur_Quantity, MAX(CASE WHEN spm.sale_or_purchase = 1 THEN spm.price ELSE 0 END) AS sale_Price, MAX(CASE WHEN spm.sale_or_purchase = 1 THEN spm.quantity ELSE 0 END) AS sale_Quantity FROM spm_recodes spm GROUP BY spm.product_no, spm.yymmdd ) c ON a.yymmdd = c.yymmdd and a.product_no = c.product_no ) d where 1 = 1 and rm between #{start} and #{end}
AND product_name LIKE '%' || #{product_name} || '%'
and to_char( to_date(yymmdd, 'yy/mm/dd'), 'yy/mm') LIKE '%' || #{yymmdd} || '%'
order by yymmdd desc)

select count(*) from ( select d.yymmdd, d.product_no, d.reg_date, d.emp_no, d.emp_name, d.product_name, d.title, d.purPrice, d.purQuantity, d.salePrice, d.saleQuantity from ( SELECT a.product_no, a.yymmdd, a.reg_date, a.emp_no, a.emp_name, a.product_name, a.title, NVL(c.pur_Price, 0) AS purPrice, NVL(c.pur_Quantity, 0) AS purQuantity, NVL(c.sale_Price, 0) AS salePrice, NVL(c.sale_Quantity, 0) AS saleQuantity, rownum rm FROM ( SELECT spm.product_no, spm.yymmdd, spm.reg_date, spm.emp_no, e.emp_name, p.product_name, ca.title FROM spm_recodes spm LEFT JOIN product p ON p.product_no = spm.product_no LEFT JOIN categories ca ON p.mid_category = ca.mid_category LEFT JOIN emp e ON e.emp_no = spm.emp_no GROUP BY spm.yymmdd, spm.reg_date, spm.emp_no, e.emp_name, p.product_name, ca.title, spm.product_no ) a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT spm.yymmdd, spm.product_no, MAX(CASE WHEN spm.sale_or_purchase = 0 THEN spm.price ELSE 0 END) AS pur_Price, MAX(CASE WHEN spm.sale_or_purchase = 0 THEN spm.quantity ELSE 0 END) AS pur_Quantity, MAX(CASE WHEN spm.sale_or_purchase = 1 THEN spm.price ELSE 0 END) AS sale_Price, MAX(CASE WHEN spm.sale_or_purchase = 1 THEN spm.quantity ELSE 0 END) AS sale_Quantity FROM spm_recodes spm GROUP BY spm.product_no, spm.yymmdd ) c ON a.yymmdd = c.yymmdd and a.product_no = c.product_no ) d where 1 = 1
AND product_name LIKE '%' || #{product_name} || '%'
and to_char( to_date(yymmdd, 'yy/mm/dd'), 'yy/mm') LIKE '%' || #{yymmdd} || '%'
order by yymmdd desc)
